Articles.Content:
when i'm in orbit, I frequently can't refire my liquid fuel engines.

Am I doin something wrong? Is it a bug?
If your ship is running out of electric charge, it will stop answering to controls. Can you post a screenshot with the resources tab visible in the upper right?

that was the problem. damnit...i should have figured that out.

thanks for you help!
You should close this to answered, m8
